title: AgentsMdRegistryEntry
description: JSON Schema for a single entry in the AGENTS.md public registry. The registry is a directory of agents and services that publish an AGENTS.md policy file at a known URL.

name.description: Human-readable display name of the agent or service publishing AGENTS.md.

url.description: Absolute URL to the AGENTS.md file. Must be publicly accessible over HTTPS. The registry verifier will fetch this URL to validate the entry.

trust_level.description: The minimum trust level declared in the agent's AGENTS.md file. Uses the generic 0-5 scale: 0=Anonymous, 1=Identified, 2=Verified, 3=Authorized, 4=Privileged, 5=Administrative.

capabilities.description: List of capability tags describing what this agent can do. These are free-form strings used for discovery and filtering. Examples: 'search', 'code-generation', 'data-analysis'.

verified.description: Whether this entry has passed automated registry verification. Verification checks: the URL is reachable over HTTPS, the file parses as valid AGENTS.md, and the declared trust_level matches the parsed minimum-trust-level. Set by the registry CI pipeline â€” do not set manually in PR submissions.

added_at.description: ISO 8601 date when this entry was added to the registry.

maintainer.description: Contact information for the person or organization responsible for this registry entry.

name.description: Name of the maintainer (individual or organization).

email.description: Contact email for the maintainer. Used for verification notifications only.

github.description: GitHub username or organization handle of the maintainer.

url.description: URL to the maintainer's profile or organization page.

description.description: Optional short description of what this agent or service does. Shown in registry UIs.
examples: A research assistant that searches academic databases and summarizes papers.
Customer support bot for Acme Corp. Handles billing and account queries.

framework.description: The AI agent framework used to build this agent, if known. Used for discovery and integration guidance.

spec_version.description: The AGENTS-MD-SPEC version this entry's AGENTS.md file targets.

examples.name: Acme Research Assistant
examples.description: Research assistant with web search and document summarization.
